mapper.select: select u.Wx_name as wxname, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, u.User_sex as usersex, u.User_old as userold, u.User_business as userbusiness, b.businessname as userbusinessname, u.User_area as userarea, u.User_bz as userbz, u.User_company as usercompany, (select User_name from tower_user_info u1 where u1.ID= u.User_tj_id) as usertjname, c.City_name as cityname, m.Score as score, m.Experience as exp, u.User_verify_state as userverifystate, u.User_team_type as userteamtype, u.User_team_img as userteamimg, u.User_win_type as userwintype, u.User_win_time as userwintime from tower_user_info u left join tower_user_charge m on m.Wx_id=u.Wx_id left join tower_city c on u.User_area=c.ID left join tower_user_business b on b.businessid=u.User_business where 1=1 and u.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;

SELECT a.Wx_id as wxid, a.Wx_name as wxname, (case a.User_sex when 1 then '男' when 2 then '女' end ) as sexname, a.Add_time as addtime, a.User_name as username, c.City_name as cityname, a.User_tele as usertele, a.User_company as usercompany, a.User_bz as userbz, (case a.user_level when 1 then '一级用户' when 2 then '二级用户' when 3 then '三级用户' when 4 then '四级用户' end ) as levelname, d.Type_name as typename, a.User_type as usertype, a.User_state as userstate, (case a.User_state when 0 then '冻结' when 1 then '正常' end ) as statename, (case a.User_verify_state when 0 then '未验证' when 1 then '已验证' end ) as verifystatename, (case a.User_team_type when 1 then '个人' when 2 then '企业' end ) as teamtypename, a.User_team_img as userteamimg, e.Order_count as ordercount, e.Succ_count as succcount, e.Ing_count as ingcount, e.Fail_count as failcount, e.Cancel_count as cancelcount, m.Score as score, m.Experience as exp, a.User_verify_state as userverifystate, a.User_team_type as userteamtype, a.User_team_img as userteamimg, s.businessname as userbusinessname, a.User_win_type as userwintype, a.User_win_time as userwintime from tower_user_info a LEFT JOIN tower_city c on c.ID = a.User_area LEFT JOIN tower_user_type d on a.User_type = d.ID LEFT JOIN tower_user_order_info e on a.Wx_id = e.Wx_id LEFT JOIN tower_user_charge m on m.Wx_id=a.Wx_id LEFT join tower_user_business s on s.businessid=a.User_business where a.Wx_id =#{wxid};

select a.Order_id as orderid, b.Tower_id as towerbh, b.Tower_name as towername, a.Tower_fee as towerfee, a.Tower_first_fee as towerfirstfee, a.Tower_end_fee as towerendfee, a.Tower_end_date as towerenddate, s.statename as towerstatename, a.Tower_add_time as toweraddtime from tower_order_detail a left join tower_order_state s on s.state=a.Tower_state left join tower_tower_info b on b.ID=a.Tower_ID where a.Tower_wx_id = #{wxid};
select u.User_area as area, a.City_id as city from tower_user_info u left join left join tower_city c on c.ID=u.Tower_area where 1=1 and u.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
select ID as id, Type_name as typename from tower_user_type
